Title: Towers of Silence (1)
Plot:
A mummified body is discovered in a disused airliner that has been parked in the desert for 6 years. 

There are indications of a link to an armed robbery at Heathrow Airport six years earlier, and a murder at around the same time. 

Our team gains two new members. DS Andrea Stephenson takes over for DS Mel Silver, and the new mad scientist is Dr Felix Gibson.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: William Scott-Masson,  Gerard Murphy,  David Walliams,  Emil Marwa,  Surinder Duhra,  Paul Bhattacharjee,  Henry Ian Cusick,  Nina Wadia,  Sara Stewart,  Neran Persaud,  Inder  Manocha,  Neil Fitzmaurice,  Andre
